system.requirements:
Tier 2; Fellowsip 35, Charm 
Aptitudes: Fellowship, Social
system.effect:
Once per Session, before the Squad makes a Logicistics Test, the character can make a -10 Charm Test to the supply distributor. If succesful they gain +5 to the Logistics Test per Degree of Success scored on the Charm test, up to +30. 
The GM may make the test harder depending on outside circumstances, such as if the distributor dislikes the squad.
